text: Octavio Paz Lozano (March 31, 1914 â€“ April 19, 1998) was a Mexican writer, poet, and diplomat. He won the 1990 Nobel Prize in Literature. On April 19, 1998, Paz died of cancer in Mexico City, Mexico. == Other websites == * Pegasos biography * Nobel museum biography and list of works * Octavio Paz's complete poems and essays from Vuelta magazine and literary criticism on his work * Octavio Paz: 'La verdad contra el compromiso' Category:1914 births Category:1998 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Mexico Category:Magazine founders Category:Mexican businesspeople Category:Mexican Nobel Prize winners Category:Mexican writers Category:Miguel de Cervantes Prize winners
title: Octavio Paz
